items.name: default-text-stagger-inview
items.title: Text Stagger Inview
items.description: Splitted text animation with staggered reveal triggered by view, You can easily customize by controlling the animation property (transform, opacity, blur) and the stagger value, and the transition with default style.

items.name: shadcn-default-text-stagger-inview
items.title: Text Stagger Inview
items.description: Splitted text animation with staggered reveal triggered by view, You can easily customize by controlling the animation property (transform, opacity, blur) and the stagger value, and the transition with shadcn-default style.

items.name: default-use-animation-variants
items.title: Use Animation Variants
items.description: Use animation variants hook, for your motion components, allows to animate component with transforms, opacity, and blur with default style.
